some evacuees feel that if they move outside their prefecture , they will lose benefits and links to their communities .有些难民本想离开他们的辖区，但是有担心会失去福利以及和社区的联系。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent. (originally in the French form): from French évacué, past participle of évacuer, from Latin evacuare (see evacuate)

entry.tran: （尤指战争时期的）撤离者，被疏散者
entry.def: An evacuee is someone who has been sent away from a dangerous place to somewhere safe, especially during a war.

means.word_mean: 1. a person who has been evacuated from a dangerous place

auth_sentence.content: He has already hired Katrina evacuee Lucius Wesson to work at Terra Cotta.
